title: Ulla Barding-Poulsen
text: Ulla Barding-Poulsen (1 July 1912 – 15 August 2000) was a Danish <a href="fencing">fencer</a>. She competed in the women's individual <a href="foil%20%28fencing%29">foil</a> event at the <a href="1936%20Summer%20Olympics">1936</a> and <a href="1952%20Summer%20Olympics">1952 Summer Olympics</a>. In the 1936 Summer Olympics, she made it to the quarter-finals where she was eliminated after winning one bout and losing four bouts. In the 1952 Summer Olympics, at the age of 40, she was eliminated in round one after winning two bouts and losing three bouts.
